short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Talenthor to keep your job positions organized in our Airtable template and find perfect candidates to fill them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Talenthor aims to help your talent acquisition processes and specifically the talent attraction phase. First of all, you need to configure your Airtable configurations and fill Talenthor, Recruitment Role Management template from Airtable universe. After that, we expect you to rate a certain amount of LinkedIn profiles so that we can understand your expectations from the possible candidates. Then, you will start receiving notifications when we find matches for the roles. You are free to ask their consent to get their contact information and reach out to them. You will manage these processes with monthly renewable credits. You will lose when you notify candidates and you will gain when you rate LinkedIn profiles.
